projectDetails.title: Development, analysis, and feasibility study of an aluminum alloy-air battery for powering electric vehicles
projectDetails.fundingAgency: Science and Engineering Research Board (SERB), Department of Science & Technology (DST), Government of India
projectDetails.duration: Initial appointment for one year, extendable up to 3 years based on performance.

positions.title: Junior Research Fellow (JRF)
positions.monthlyEmolument: Consolidated amount of Rs. 31,000/- per month for the first 2 years and Rs. 35,000/- per month for the third year.
positions.essentialQualifications: ME / M.Tech in Manufacturing Technology or relevant / Materials Science & Engineering / Power Electronics / Master's degree in Physics or other relevant subjects (with a minimum of 60% marks or equivalent CGPA) from recognized Universities/Institutes, with CSIR/UGC-NET or valid GATE score.
positions.desirableQualifications: Knowledge / experience in chemical synthesis, electro physics, electrochemistry, and fuel cell will be preferred.
positions.ageLimit: 28 years on the date of application, with relaxation for SC/ST/OBC candidates as per Government of India norms.

positions.title: Project Assistant
positions.monthlyEmolument: Consolidated amount of Rs. 20,000/- per month.
positions.essentialQualifications: B.Sc. in Physics or other relevant subjects / Three years Diploma in Mechanical or relevant Engineering and Technology after 12th Science with a minimum of 60% marks or equivalent grade.
positions.desirableQualifications: Knowledge / experience in chemical synthesis, electro physics, electrochemistry, and fuel cell will be preferred.
positions.ageLimit: 28 years on the date of application, with relaxation for SC/ST/OBC candidates as per Government of India norms.

applicationInstructions.summary: Interested candidates are requested to submit the attached application format, a detailed CV, and scanned copies of all documents as a single PDF file (max 10 MB).

recruitmentProcess.selectionNote: Only shortlisted candidates will be called for the interview. No TA/DA will be paid.

termsAndConditions: Candidates must ensure they are eligible before applying.
The initial appointment is for one year, extendable up to 3 years based on performance.
No TA/DA is permissible for the interview or joining.
Original documents must be brought for verification at the time of the interview.
The selected candidate will have the option to register for a PhD program at NIT Agartala, subject to eligibility criteria.
